channel.title: Ok i need some codes bad
channel.description: [size=25pt]I need to know some stuff plz help [tt][code]i need to know 1-ect 1.how to change were iteams spaw.. 2.how to change starter cltohs 3.how to change starter location. 4.how to change were objects are like dummies hay ect.. 5.need to know how to make hay give xp if u click on it.. 6.NEED SOME BODY THAT CAN CODE SPECS.. 7.how to change total combat lvl[/code]

item.title: Ok i need some codes bad
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

7. Use good topic titles Your topic title must have something to do with your problem, do not just add 'HEEEEELP ME'. Also try reading the FAQs or the tutorial forums before you post a thread.
Use good topic titles
i need to know 1-ect 1.how to change were iteams spaw.. 2.how to change starter cltohs 3.how to change starter location. 4.how to change were objects are like dummies hay ect.. 5.need to know how to make hay give xp if u click on it.. 6.NEED SOME BODY THAT CAN CODE SPECS.. 7.how to change total combat lvl
  1. itemspawnpoints.java (incase you didnt know, the other java files exists for a reason)
  2. player.java,you might wanna figure it out yourself
  3. player.java as well.
  4. Your global objects void.If you don’t have one add it.
  5. Case ####: Example if the hay is ID 7 , search for Case 7:
  6. That you have to learn yourself
  7. client.java and player.java

Read full topic

item.title: Ok i need some codes bad
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

  1. Globalobjects()

  2. Cases, make it show cases when you click, and view run.bat and use this code.

case ####: addSkillXP(#,#); break;

  1. maxplayerLevel()

Read full topic

2. Go to player.java edit

playerEquipment[playerHat]=7394; playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1712; playerEquipment[playerChest]=7390; playerEquipment[playerShield]=2890; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=7386; playerEquipment[playerHands]=775; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4675;

teleportToX = 3072;//3072; teleportToY = 3312;//3312;

i can’t post the rest i have to go
bye everything will be different[/quote]
